name: cilkpride
description: Experimental package that passively runs cilksan in the background for Cilk projects.

idleSeconds.title: Idle Length
idleSeconds.description: Changes the number of seconds the text editor must be idle before running cilkscreen.

cilktoolsPath.title: Cilktools Executable Path
cilktoolsPath.description: The location of the Cilktools executables, to run cilkscreen.

cilkLibPath.title: Cilk Library Path
cilkLibPath.description: The location of the Cilk lib files, so that the plugin can appropriately build executables.
